rows.label: bf04240100_0010
rows.name: You've gotten better, boy.

rows.label: bf04240100_0020
rows.name: Hikari...

rows.label: bf04240100_0030
rows.name:
I know, I know.
I won't use that power, okay?

rows.label: bf04240100_0040
rows.name: Let's stick to Foresight for this.

rows.label: bf04240100_0050
rows.name:
If an attack is absolutely necessary,
I'll switch to Homura.

rows.label: bf04240100_0060
rows.name: I'm counting on you.

rows.label: bf04240100_0070
rows.name:
Holy Grail of Heaven, your appearance seems to have changed.
What happened?

rows.label: bf04240100_0080
rows.name:
If you want me to tell you, put away your sword,
you stubborn fool.

rows.label: bf04240100_0090
rows.name: I'll listen to your confession while you lie defeated!

rows.label: bf04240100_0100
rows.name: Rex! After this Foresight, I'll switch to Homura!

rows.label: bf04240100_0110
rows.name: Understood!

rows.label: bf04240100_0120
rows.name: Impossible... He dodged it?!

rows.label: bf04240100_0130
rows.name: Now it's my turn!

rows.label: bf04240100_0140
rows.name: Meleph-sama! Look at the Holy Grail!

rows.label: bf04240100_0150
rows.name: So it means she can change freely.

rows.label: bf04240100_0160
rows.name: Go!

rows.label: bf04240100_0170
rows.name: ...Homura?

rows.label: bf04240100_0180
rows.name: There's no need to hit them, right?

rows.label: bf04240100_0190
rows.name:
Hah!
It's like you read my mind.

rows.label: bf04240100_0200
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Hee hee.

rows.label: bf04240100_0210
rows.name: Are you holding back on me again, boy?

rows.label: bf04240100_0220
rows.name: We just don't have any reason to fight you.

rows.label: bf04240100_0230
rows.name: [ML:undisp ] ...

rows.label: bf04240100_0240
rows.name: Enough! Both of you!

rows.label: bf04240100_0250
rows.name: You are...

rows.label: bf04240100_0252
rows.name:
Certainly from the 
Avaritia Trading Company's Intelligence Division...

rows.label: bf04240100_0260
rows.name: Meleph-sama, please put away your sword.

rows.label: bf04240100_0270
rows.name:
These not the ones who infiltrate
the facility and attack your soldiers.
